Notes: A variant of a Wiggler intended to be used on tube slides. It needs to be connected to a proper TubeSlider instance using GeneratorId in order to be created. Its Obj_args specify how it gets positioned on the slide. Unlike its normal variants, it cannot be defeated. However, it can be frozen by the Orange Luma.

Obj_arg0.Name: Forwards Speed
Obj_arg0.Description: How fast it moves along the TubeSlider's path. The actual speed value needs to be multiplied by 10. Default is 100.

Obj_arg1.Name: Sidewards Speed
Obj_arg1.Description: How fast it revolves around the TubeSlider's path. The actual speed value needs to be multiplied by 10. Default is 20.

Obj_arg2.Name: Number of Body Parts
Obj_arg2.Description: How many body parts it consists of. Minimum is 1, default is 5.

Obj_arg3.Name: Is Angry?
Obj_arg3.Description: If set, it will turn red and move around more aggressively.

Obj_arg5.Name: Initial Angle
Obj_arg5.Description: The angle around the tube slide at which the object gets positioned initially.

SW_A.Description: If used, it will remain inactive until this switch gets activated.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.
